  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU not required

requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: SteamOS 3.*
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: PulseAudio-compatible card
  • Additional Notes: Designed for SteamDeck
